channel.title: Invalid number of parameters?
channel.description:
Sorry for asking two questions within half an hour of each other but i'm new to errors :P
i get this error
Line 42: [Error] (14869:1): Invalid number of parameters in script
And this is line 36 - 49
[code]procedure kill; begin wait(100 + random(200)) if (alvl9 = true) then begin clickmouse(x,y,8260991,false) wait(100 + random(200)) clickmouse(x,y,('ttack Al-Kharid Warrior'),true); else begin wait(1000+random(3000)) kattackmonster(8260991,'l-Kharid Warrior'); randoms; end; [/code]
i've never got this error before so i'm not too sure how to fix it , Thanks in advance
~ hai

item.title: Invalid number of parameters?
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

If you want it to find the color, and then click it, I suggest using FindObj from SRL, or colorfinding like this:

Procedure AttackWarrior; var FX,FY: integer; begin if findcolor(FX,FY,8260991,MSX1,MSY1,MSX2,MSY2) then begin FX:=FX+random(3); FY:=FY+random(3); MMouse(FX,FY,0,0,false); if IsUpTextMulti('Kharid','Warrior','Ack Al') then Mouse(FX,FY,0,0,true); end; end;

Get it?

Read full topic

item.title: Invalid number of parameters?
item.dc:creator: @aznph8playa aznph8playa
item.description:
@aznph8playa wrote:

As theifmn6092 said, clickmouse only takes 3 parameters.
The error invalid number of parameters in script simply means that you’ve called a function at that line and have tried to put too few or too many arguments into the function for example:

The function wait takes an integer parameter so

wait(1000,1000)

Is illegal as well as

wait()

PS. Add further questions to the same thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Invalid number of parameters?
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

clickmouse(x,y,8260991,false)

clickmouse(x,y,true/false) Nothing else should be in clickmouse. Anymore questions MSN me or PM me

Read full topic
